channel.title: Poco on pj-x86's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Poco on pj-x86's blog

item.title: poco源码安装
item.description: redhat7.7-x86_64 源码安装 poco-1.9.4 链接到标题 依赖 c++11，不依赖 c++14(poco-1.10.0 版本开始强制依赖 c++14) mkdir cmake-build cd cmake-build cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr/local/poco-1.9.4 --build . --target install .. make -j make install 配置环境变量 vi ·/.bash_profile export
